title: Convergence of Mathematics and Film: Social Analysis Project Utilizing Film Clips

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners use personal devices for film clip analysis and collaboration tools, aiming to train mathematical thinking in social contexts

learning_goals: Identify mathematical concepts (probability, geometry, patterns, etc.) appearing in film clips and apply them to solve real-world problems
Write reports explaining social phenomena (racial discrimination, economic inequality, etc.) based on mathematical data analyzed through video media
Design film clip-based learning materials through team projects and propose improvements via peer assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
